name.pehl.gwt.piriti.rebind
Class FieldContext

java.lang.Object
  name.pehl.gwt.piriti.rebind.FieldContext

public class FieldContext
extends Object

Class which contains information needed to generate code for the XPath evaluation, conversion and assignment of a field. An instance of this class is generated in XmlReaderCreator and passed to the FieldHandler.

Version:
$LastChangedRevision: 60 $
Author:
$LastChangedBy: harald.pehl $
